title: La Fontana della Frutta
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This is a deli and shop that makes food including couscous, salads, stuffed vegetables, quiche as well as meat dishes; prices are per kilo. It also sells fruits and vegetables, nuts, grains, juices and freshly made fruit & vegetable shakes. There are a few tables with bar stools and the food will be heated if you wish. Veg not labelled but staff can point to what's vegan.
